itha sthawara tibet deshayak godanangamin ehi siyalu aakaraye jana wargayanta ayath jana jiwithaya saha owunge depalawala aarakshawa surakshitha karamin owun abhiwruddhiya kara ragena yama pinisa chinaya dadiwa kapawi sitinawa.ehidi chinaye bhaumika akhandathawa binda damanu was diyath kerena kisidu aakarayaka ho uthsahayayanta tibet jathikayan athulu siyalu janawargayan wiruddha wanu athi athara ewani kuta upaka්ramayan samawitama parajayata da pathwenu athi.wayambaa diga chinaye sichuaan pa්radeshaye pasugiya mayi masayedi itha darunu bhumikampawak hata gaththa.

loka prakata ‘lonli planat’ sancharaka sangarawa magin 2019 wasare lokaye hondama sancharaka gamanantha dahaya atharin shri lankawa mulika sthanayata nam kirima ape sancharaka wyaparaya lath jayagrahanayak bawath, ee jayagrahanayen udam nowi ape sancharaka wyaparaya thawa thawath sanwardhanaya karalima sandaha nawa manpeth sewiya yuthu bawath agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha pawasiya.

antan pranandu liyu aluthma nawakathawa ‘awathakseruwa’ me masa 29 wanida angaharuwada ude 10.00 ta kolambaa maradane, dayawansha jayakodi saha samagamaye nawa poth pradarshanagaraye di dorata wadi.‘awathakseruwa’ nawakathawen kiyawenne siyalu abhiyoga, aadaraya manushika hangim menma manushika awashyatha athara atharaman wuwath thamange aathma gaurawaya saha pathi bhakthiyath pathiwathath diwi himiyen rakina shreshta gahaniyaka pilibandawaya.karthru - ee.bi. aariyarathnamila - ru. 225prakashanaya - nanila prakashakayopasalwala 5 shreniya daruwan ilakka kara sakasi athi mema kruthiya daruwanta pahasuwen therum gatha haki lesata wadagath men ma pahasuwen sapayagatha nohaki wishayaya karunu rasak athulath kara atha.
ridmayanukulawa gayena ambawa - dhiwara githaya samangin ridmayata asimitha shramayak kati wana ma dal adina dhiwara samuhayaki.
